title: Move admin panel to subtle bottom corner access

requirements.text: Move the admin panel link from the main navigation to a subtle, fixed position in the bottom-right corner of the website that is visible but not prominent

quotes: admin panel ko website ke last me bilkul corner par har kisi ko na dikhe vaise rakho but visble ho

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel access is removed from the main header navigation
A small, subtle button or icon appears fixed in the bottom-right corner of all pages
The corner element is visible but designed to be inconspicuous (small size, low opacity, or minimal styling)
Clicking the corner element navigates to the admin login/panel
The corner element remains accessible on all viewport sizes

requirements.text: Style the bottom corner admin access element to be discreet - use minimal visual emphasis such as small icon size, reduced opacity, or subtle coloring that blends with the page footer area

quotes: har kisi ko na dikhe vaise rakho but visble ho

acceptanceCriteria: The admin access element has low visual prominence (e.g., opacity 0.3-0.5 on normal state)
Element size is small enough to not draw attention but large enough to be clickable
On hover, the element becomes more visible to confirm it is interactive
The styling matches the overall design but remains subtle

constraints: Do not change the admin authentication logic or access control
Maintain the existing admin panel functionality and features
Keep the admin login form and dashboard pages unchanged
nonGoals: Changing admin panel functionality or features
Changing the main navigation structure beyond removing the admin link
